metaTitle: LU24 Los Montesinos | 3 Bed Villas from €439,900
metaDescription: Discover LU24 Los Montesinos - luxury 3 bedroom villas from €439,900 by ALICANTE NEW VILLAS. Modern design, delivery 2026. 40% less than island markets.

content.heroIntro: Welcome to LU24, an exceptional residential development by ALICANTE NEW VILLAS located in the charming area of La Cardalissa, Los Montesinos. This exclusive project offers premium 3-bedroom, 3-bathroom villas with 108m² of contemporary living space built on generous 257m² plots. Priced from just €439,900, LU24 represents outstanding value in the Costa Blanca market - 40% less than comparable Spanish island properties. Each villa features modern architectural design, high-quality finishes, and private amenities including swimming pools and landscaped gardens. ALICANTE NEW VILLAS has crafted these homes for international buyers seeking the perfect blend of luxury, location, and investment potential. With completion targeted for September 1st, 2026, LU24 is your opportunity to own a piece of Spanish Mediterranean lifestyle in one of the region's most sought-after emerging locations.

locationSection.intro: La Cardalissa in Los Montesinos offers an authentic Costa Blanca experience away from overcrowded tourist areas, yet with convenient access to all essential services and attractions. This established residential area has become increasingly popular with international buyers seeking genuine Spanish charm combined with modern infrastructure. Los Montesinos benefits from strong community spirit with an well-integrated expat population where English is widely spoken. The area perfectly balances peaceful suburban living with proximity to world-class golf courses, pristine Mediterranean beaches, and comprehensive healthcare facilities. Property values in Los Montesinos have demonstrated consistent growth of +8% year-on-year, reflecting strong market confidence and excellent rental potential with weekly rates averaging €800. Whether you're seeking a permanent residence, holiday home, or investment property, La Cardalissa provides the ideal Costa Blanca setting.
highlights: Beach: Multiple Blue Flag beaches within 20 minutes
Shopping: Mercadona, Lidl, Consum supermarkets nearby
Schools: International schools with British curriculum options

propertyFeatures.intro: LU24 villas represent the pinnacle of modern Spanish construction, built to the highest European standards by ALICANTE NEW VILLAS. Each residence features premium materials, contemporary architectural design, and thoughtfully planned layouts maximizing natural light and outdoor living spaces. The construction includes thermal efficiency measures, quality finishes throughout, and smart home pre-installations. Every villa is designed for comfortable Mediterranean living with attention to both aesthetic appeal and practical family needs. The development emphasizes quality over quantity, ensuring each property maintains its exclusivity and value.
features: Fully fitted kitchen with quality appliances
Double glazing with thermal break insulation

content.investmentSection: LU24 presents a compelling investment opportunity in a market showing strong fundamentals. Los Montesinos property values have appreciated 8% year-on-year, with projections suggesting continued growth as infrastructure improves and the area becomes better known internationally. At €439,900, LU24 villas offer exceptional value - 40% below comparable properties in popular Spanish islands, providing significant appreciation potential. The rental market is robust, with similar properties generating €800 per week, delivering attractive returns for investor-owners. The established international community and proven tourism interest in the Costa Blanca ensure steady demand for holiday rentals. Combined with Spain's attractive non-resident tax benefits and the development's completion before the peak 2026 summer season, LU24 represents strategic real estate investment aligned with market trends.

faqs.question: What is the price of properties in LU24?
faqs.answer: LU24 villas start from €439,900. Each property features 3 bedrooms, 3 bathrooms, 108m² of built space, and 257m² plot. Contact us for current inventory and pricing details.

faqs.question: When will LU24 be completed?
faqs.answer: Completion is scheduled for September 1st, 2026. ALICANTE NEW VILLAS provides a comprehensive 10-year structural warranty. We recommend contacting us directly to discuss specific delivery timelines for available units.

faqs.question: Who is the developer of LU24?
faqs.answer: ALICANTE NEW VILLAS is the developer - an established builder with proven expertise constructing quality residential properties in Los Montesinos and the surrounding Costa Blanca region.

faqs.question: Is Costa Blanca a good place to buy property?
faqs.answer: Yes, the Costa Blanca is an excellent property market. The region offers year-round sunshine, established international communities, strong rental demand, and consistent property appreciation. Los Montesinos specifically demonstrates +8% year-on-year growth with access to Mediterranean beaches and championship golf courses.

faqs.question: Can foreigners buy property in Spain?
faqs.answer: Yes, foreign nationals can purchase property in Spain without restrictions. You'll need an NIE (Spanish tax identification number) and should consult with a Spanish lawyer regarding purchase procedures and tax implications.

faqs.question: How far is LU24 from the beach?
faqs.answer: Multiple Blue Flag beaches are within 20 minutes of LU24, offering easy access to pristine Mediterranean coastline for swimming, water sports, and beach leisure.

faqs.question: What amenities are near LU24?
faqs.answer: LU24 benefits from excellent nearby amenities: Mercadona, Lidl, and Consum supermarkets for shopping; Regional hospital within 30 minutes for healthcare; several championship golf courses for recreation; and international schools with British curriculum options for families.

faqs.question: What are the costs of buying property in Spain?
faqs.answer: Property purchase costs typically include: 6-8% transfer tax, notary fees (0.5-1%), property registration (0.1%), and legal fees (approximately 1%). These vary by region and property value. Consult a Spanish lawyer for precise calculations.

faqs.question: What are property taxes in Spain?
faqs.answer: Annual property taxes (IBI) typically range from 0.4% to 0.8% of the property's cadastral value. Non-resident owners may have additional tax obligations. Contact local authorities in Los Montesinos for specific rates applicable to LU24.

content.conclusion: LU24 represents a rare opportunity to acquire premium Costa Blanca property with substantial value advantages and strong investment credentials. ALICANTE NEW VILLAS has created an exclusive collection of 3-bedroom villas combining modern design, quality construction, and exceptional locations in La Cardalissa. With prices from €439,900 - significantly below comparable markets - LU24 appeals to owner-occupiers, holiday home buyers, and investment-focused purchasers alike. The September 2026 completion timing positions you perfectly to benefit from the property's immediate market value and strong rental income potential. The established international community, excellent amenities within minutes, and proven appreciation trends make LU24 a smart real estate decision. Don't miss this opportunity to secure your Costa Blanca lifestyle. Contact us today via WhatsApp for detailed information, virtual tours, and available unit specifics. Your Mediterranean dream awaits at LU24.
